job_tasks.phrase: guide customers in their cloud data warehousing transformation
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates guiding customers through a significant business process (cloud data warehousing transformation), implying an understanding of business goals and how technology supports them.

job_tasks.phrase: aligning their technical roadmap for the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to aligning technical solutions with a customer's strategic plan or roadmap, a core aspect of business understanding.
This phrase reinforces the idea of connecting technical strategy with business objectives and future planning.
This phrase refers to the technologies and scale involved in data warehousing, which falls under data engineering processes.
Enterprise data catalogues are part of managing and organizing data assets, which is a data engineering concern.
Lake house architecture is a modern approach to data management and engineering.
Data governance involves policies and procedures for managing data, which is a critical part of data engineering and management.
This involves connecting different data management systems, a data engineering task.
Planning the migration of data and systems to production environments is a key data engineering activity.
This phrase directly addresses the management and oversight of data within an enterprise, a core data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: map those to fit organizational requirements
job_tasks.justification: Understanding how data governance concepts fit organizational needs is part of data engineering and management.
This refers to the practical application of data governance tools and strategies.
Workload sizing and performance estimation are crucial for efficient data engineering and infrastructure planning.
This is a direct reference to creating models for data structures and relationships.
Performance tuning often involves optimizing data models and query execution, which relates to the performance of data systems.
This describes an interaction with end-users or clients, requiring skills in presenting and supporting solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: working with and supporting Solution Architects
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration within a technical team, likely involving development and integration efforts.
This implies practical experience in building and deploying solutions in a live environment.
This often involves building proofs of concept or demonstrating solutions, which requires development skills.
Designing the structure and components of a system is a fundamental software development activity.
Creating proofs of concept requires development and implementation skills.
Optimizing workloads for live environments is a software development and deployment task.
This involves communicating technical knowledge and demonstrating how to use systems, a form of developer advocacy or technical enablement.
Hackathons are events focused on rapid software development and innovation.
Presenting at conferences typically involves showcasing technical work and solutions.
This implies engaging with and contributing to the development and sharing of knowledge within a technical community.
This phrase directly relates to the deployment of solutions into a live, operational environment.
Planning for production environments, including their operational aspects, falls under MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: working with and supporting Solution Architects
strengthen your technical skills through mentorship, learning, and internal training programs
guide strategic customers to successful cloud transformations

classification.rationale: This job description heavily emphasizes data warehousing, data governance, and customer-facing solution engineering. It lacks any mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, which are the core focus of the GenAI Engineer profile.
